text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Hazardous liquid" means any:
petroleum or petroleum product;
anhydrous ammonia;
carbon dioxide; and
any substance or material that:
is in a liquid state when transported by a pipeline facility; and
may pose an unreasonable risk to life or property when transported by a pipeline facility, as determined by the United States Secretary of Transportation.
"Hazardous liquid" does not include liquefied natural gas.

text.section: "Interstate pipeline" means a pipeline, or part of a pipeline, regulated under 49 U.S.C. Chapter 601 that is used in the transportation of hazardous liquids or carbon dioxide in interstate or foreign commerce.

"Intrastate pipeline" means a pipeline, or part of a pipeline, regulated under 49 U.S.C. Chapter 601 that:
is used in the transportation of hazardous liquids or carbon dioxide; and
is not an interstate pipeline.
"Pipeline facility" means new and existing pipe, rights-of-way, and any equipment, facility, or building used in the transportation of hazardous liquids or carbon dioxide.
"Pipeline operator" means a person who owns or operates a pipeline facility.
